title: Crows: Are They Scary Or Just Super Smart?
description: Crows have gotten a bad rap throughout history — a group of them is called a "murder," after all. To get some insight into crows and perhaps set the record straight, we talked to Kaeli Swift. She's a lecturer at the University of Washington and wrote her doctoral thesis on crow "funerals."

itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: We learn some crow facts and leave it to you — do crows deserve their creepy reputation?
itunes:subtitle: We learn some crow facts and leave it to you — do crows deserve their creepy reputation?
